column6: TOMB OF NAMOR PART 1 The debut of Ultimate Sub-Mariner is here! Namor has been released from his aquatic tomb and after 5,000 years of being locked away, he is more than ready to finish what he started: taking over the world!
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller (cover):Greg Land | writer:Mark Millar | colorist:Justin Ponsor | inker:Matt Ryan
